1: הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ ׀ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> הוֹד֣וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>O give thanks</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for [he is] good</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[endureth] for ever</n> חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>for his mercy</n>
2: מִ֗י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יְ֭מַלֵּל <sup>4448 </sup> <n>Who can utter</n> גְּבוּר֣וֹת <sup>1369 </sup> <n>the mighty acts</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>show</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>deep</n>

4: זָכְרֵ֣נִי <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> בִּרְצ֣וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>with the favour</n> עַמֶּ֑ךָ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[that thou bearest unto] thy people</n> פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי <sup>6485 </sup> <n>O visit</n> בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>me with thy salvation</n>
5: לִרְא֤וֹת ׀ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>That I may see</n> בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת <sup>2896 </sup> <n>the good</n> בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ <sup>972 </sup> <n>of thy chosen</n> לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>that I may rejoice</n> בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>in the gladness</n> גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of thy nation</n> לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>that I may glory</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>with thine inheritance</n>
6: חָטָ֥אנוּ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>We have sinned</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>like</n> אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>with our fathers</n> הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ <sup>5753 </sup> <n>we have committed iniquity</n> הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <sup>7561 </sup> <n>we have done wickedly</n>
7: אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>Our fathers</n> בְמִצְרַ֨יִם ׀ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>in Egypt</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ <sup>7919 </sup> <n>understood</n> נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ <sup>6381 </sup> <n>not thy wonders</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> זָ֭כְרוּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>they remembered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>not the multitude</n> חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>of thy mercies</n> וַיַּמְר֖וּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>but provoked</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> יָ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>[him] at the sea</n> בְּיַם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> סֽוּף׃ <sup>5488 </sup> <n>[even] at the Red</n>

37: וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>Yea they sacrificed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּ֭נֵיהֶם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>their sons</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n> לַשֵּֽׁדִים׃ <sup>7700 </sup> <n>unto devils</n>
38: וַיִּֽשְׁפְּכ֨וּ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>And shed</n> דָ֪ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> נָקִ֡י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>innocent</n> דַּם־ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>[even] the blood</n> בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of their sons</n> וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and of their daughters</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whom</n> זִ֭בְּחוּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>whom they sacrificed</n> לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י <sup>6091 </sup> <n>unto the idols</n> כְנָ֑עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף <sup>2610 </sup> <n>was polluted</n> הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> בַּדָּמִֽים׃ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>with blood</n>
39: וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>Thus were they defiled</n> בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <sup>4639 </sup> <n>with their own works</n> וַ֝יִּזְ֗נוּ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>and went a whoring</n> בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4611 </sup> <n>with their own inventions</n>
40: וַיִּֽחַר־ <sup>2734 </sup> <n>kindled</n> אַ֣ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>Therefore was the wrath</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>against his people</n> וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב <sup>8581 </sup> <n>insomuch that he abhorred</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>his own inheritance</n>
41: וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And he gave</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into the hand</n> גּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> וַֽיִּמְשְׁל֥וּ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>them ruled</n> בָ֝הֶ֗ם שֹׂנְאֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and they that hated</n>
42: וַיִּלְחָצ֥וּם <sup>3905 </sup> <n>also oppressed</n> אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>Their enemies</n> וַ֝יִּכָּנְע֗וּ <sup>3665 </sup> <n>them and they were brought into subjection</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> יָדָֽם׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>under their hand</n>
43: פְּעָמִ֥ים <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> רַבּ֗וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Many</n> יַצִּ֫ילֵ֥ם <sup>5337 </sup> <n>did he deliver</n> וְ֭הֵמָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>however</n> יַמְר֣וּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>them but they provoked</n> בַעֲצָתָ֑ם <sup>6098 </sup> <n>[him] with their counsel</n> וַ֝יָּמֹ֗כּוּ <sup>4355 </sup> <n>and were brought low</n> בַּעֲוֹנָֽם׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>for their iniquity</n>
44: וַ֭יַּרְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Nevertheless he regarded</n> בַּצַּ֣ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>their affliction</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> בְּ֝שָׁמְע֗וֹ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>when he heard</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רִנָּתָֽם׃ <sup>7440 </sup> <n>their cry</n>
45: וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>And he remembered</n> לָהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> בְּרִית֑וֹ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>for them his covenant</n> וַ֝יִּנָּחֵ֗ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>and repented</n> כְּרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>according to the multitude</n> [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>favour</n> ק)
46: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He made</n> אוֹתָ֣ם <sup>853 </sup> לְרַחֲמִ֑ים <sup>7356 </sup> <n>them also to be pitied</n> לִ֝פְנֵ֛י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> שׁוֹבֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>all those that carried them captives</n>
47: הוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ ׀ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>Save</n> יְה֘וָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>us O LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>our God</n> וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather</n> מִֽן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>us from among the heathen</n> לְ֭הֹדוֹת <sup>3034 </sup> <n>to give thanks</n> לְשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>unto thy holy</n> לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ <sup>7623 </sup> <n>[and] to triumph</n> בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>in thy praise</n>
48: בָּר֤וּךְ־ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֪י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>From</n> הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם ׀ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>from everlasting</n> וְעַ֬ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> הָעוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>to everlasting</n> וְאָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and let all the people</n> אָמֵ֗ן <sup>543 </sup> <n>Amen</n> הַֽלְלוּ־ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָֽהּ׃ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n>
